channel.title: booty_world on Lemmy Community Directory
channel.description: Recent content in booty_world on Lemmy Community Directory

item.title: General Discussion
item.description: /c/General Discussion on booty.world https://booty.world/c/general Description Community for general chat, suggestions, shooting the shit, etc. Still fine to post booty pics or even memes but mostly keep it to discussion topics. I figure this will be pretty slim but could be used for like announcements and such perhaps. The `community` itself is marked NOT NSFW but that type of content is still allowed (as long as its legal) but be sure to mark your `post` NSFW.

item.title: Welcome to Booty World
item.description: /c/Welcome to Booty World on booty.world https://booty.world/c/welcome Description Welcome page for Booty World a primarily NSFW instance dedicated to the callipygian form üçë. This community is not marked NSFW to help with discoverability. **‚ö†Ô∏è See spoiler section below for a list of the NSFW communities that would otherwise be hidden if you are not logged in!!!** --- **Uploads** Would prefer if you could use an image/vid host and just post that vs uploading please.
